pages.about_cookies_fan_s: Cookies on the site: how they work and why they are needed. Cookies are small pieces of data that websites store on a user's computer. Home About Us How to start FAQ'S Users Say Previews DOWNLOAD APP Cookies on the site: how they work and why they are needed Cookies are small text files that are stored on the user's device when visiting a website. They play an important role in modern web technology, allowing sites to remember certain information about visitors and provide a more personalized, convenient and secure experience. When a user first visits a website, cookies are created and sent to their device through the browser. These files contain unique identifiers that allow the site to recognize the user on repeat visits. Cookies remember information such as language preferences, preferred topics or interests, which helps the site provide more personalized content and improve the user experience. In addition, cookies are also used to track user activity on the website. They can remember which pages the user visited, how long he spent on the site, and what products he viewed or added to his cart. All this information can later be used to analyze user behavior and optimize the site. It is important to note that cookies are completely safe. They cannot transmit viruses or malicious code to the user's device. Moreover, the user always has full control over cookies and can choose whether to allow or block their use. Many websites and online platforms rely on cookies to provide their functionality. For example, without cookies, some sites will not be able to remember the user's login and password, which will make the need to log in on each page very inconvenient.Cookies can also be used for advertising purposes, allowing more relevant advertisements to be shown based on the user's preferences and interests. However, the use of cookies may raise certain privacy concerns. Therefore, many websites include a notice about the collection and use of cookies so that the user can accept or reject their use. Also, there are various security settings in web browsers that allow you to control the operation of cookies on your device. Taken together, website cookies play an important role in providing a more personalized, convenient and secure user experience. They help sites remember user preferences and provide more relevant content. At the same time, users have full control over cookies and can choose what data sites can use and under what conditions. Home About Us How to start FAQ'S Users Say Previews DOWNLOAD APP Disclaimer for FanSports fantasy sports fans This document serves as a disclaimer for the FanSports mobile application, and outlines the terms and conditions upon which the app and its services are provided to users. By downloading and accessing the FanSports app, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following disclaimer. 1. Accuracy of Information FanSports app provides users with fantasy sports-related content, including statistical data, news, player performance, and analysis. While we strive to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the information provided, we do not guarantee its completeness, reliability, or suitability for any particular purpose. Users are advised to independently verify all information before making any decisions or taking any actions based on the content provided by the app. 2. User Responsibilities Users of the FanSports app are solely responsible for their own actions and decisions. Any reliance on the information provided by the app is done at the individual's own risk. FanSports cannot be held liable for any losses, damages, or consequences resulting from the use or misuse of the app or its services. 3. Financial and Legal Advice The content provided by FanSports app is intended for informational purposes only and should not be considered as financial or legal advice. Users are advised to seek professional advice from qualified experts before making any financial or legal decisions based on the information provided by the app. 4. Third-Party Content and Links FanSports app may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by FanSports. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. Users are advised to review the terms and conditions and privacy policies of these third parties before engaging with their services. 5. Changes to the App and Terms FanSports reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of the app or its services at any time without prior notice or liability. We also reserve the right to update or modify this disclaimer at any time. Users are responsible for regularly reviewing the disclaimer for any changes. 6. Limitation of Liability Under no circumstances shall FanSports or its affiliates, partners, or employees be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use the FanSports app or its services. By using the FanSports app, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the terms and conditions outlined in this disclaimer. If you do not agree with any part of this disclaimer, you must not use the app or its services. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this exciting game today! FanSports Fantasy Sport App is an innovative platform designed for true sports connoisseurs and fantasy game lovers. Combining the excellence of technology and the passion for competition, this application is a real boon for anyone who wants to plunge into the exciting world of virtual sports competitions. different sports A variety of sports are presented here, ranging from cricket and golf to such football, basketball and hockey. unique command system Each user can act as a head coach, assembling his own team of real sports stars various game modes From classic solo competitions to competition between friends or even entire teams, there is something for everyone. Top FanSports APP previews FanSports App is the optimal solution for you ❮ prev next ❯ What our players say This application is without a doubt highly appreciated by everyone who wants to enjoy a unique combination of competition, strategy and exciting gameplay One of the main reasons why the FanSports Fantasy Sport App is worth trying is its huge variety of sports on offer. From football and basketball to hockey and baseball, this app caters to the interests of all sports lovers. With a wide range of leagues and competitions available, you can choose exactly what you like and create the team of your dreams. ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ Hitesh One of the key benefits of the FanSports Fantasy Sport App is its ease of use and intuitive interface. It's a surprisingly simple way to create, manage, and update your team. All functions, including player selection, strategy and squad management, are intuitive and accessible even to a beginner. ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ Kunal The FanSports Fantasy Sport App features unparalleled quality of data and statistics offered to users. You get full access to real statistics that allow you to make fact-based decisions when selecting players for your team. Moreover, superb real-time data updates ensure that you are always one step ahead of your rivals. ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ Durgesh Co-op play mode is one of the greatest features of the FanSports Fantasy Sport App. You can create teams with friends, create your own leagues and compete in unique championships. The ability to compete with friends and enjoy playing together is one of the main reasons why users love this app. ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ ✭ Aman What is FanSports App? The FanSports App is a complete virtual sports platform that offers endless possibilities for those who want to immerse themselves in the world of fantasy sports. With an unrivaled variety of sports, an intuitive interface, up-to-date data and the ability to play with friends, this app sets new standards in the fantasy sports industry. If you are looking for an excellent fantasy sports app, FanSports Fantasy Sport App is a great choice for you. Enjoy playing FanSports App and immerse yourself in the exciting world of fantasy sports! DOWNLOAD APP How to start playing FanSports App? If you want to start playing FanSports App and fully immerse yourself in the world of virtual fantasy sports, then you will need a little time and certain steps to get started STEP 1 Download the FanSports After installing the application, you will need to create an account to get full access to all features and functionality STEP 2 Select the specific sport FanSports offers a wide selection of different sports, including cricket, football, baseball so you can choose the one that interests you most STEP 3 Create your fantasy team You will have a limited budget to assemble the strongest possible team, so choose wisely and thoughtfully STEP 4 Choose the tournament You will be able to use various tactics and techniques to win and become a real champion FAQ's ✧ How do I compete on the FanSports App? To compete in the FanSports App, open the app and go to the "Competitions" section. You will be offered various participation options: from weekly matches to seasonal championships. Select the appropriate option and follow the rules and actions. ✧ How does the virtual draft work in the FanSports App? The Virtual Draft in the FanSports App is the process of selecting a team's players from an available list. The draft is held virtually, with each participant taking turns making their selection. In the FanSports App, the virtual draft is conducted automatically, taking into account the preferences and rules set by each participant ✧ What options are there for managing a team in the FanSports App? The FanSports App provides many options for managing your team. You can change the composition of the team, organize training sessions, monitor player statistics, set tactics, exchange players with other teams and much more. The app provides all the necessary tools to effectively manage your fantasy team. ✧ What event information and results can be found on the FanSports App? The FanSports App gives you information on current and upcoming games, match schedules, player stats, standings, expert commentary and more. The app provides important information so you can make informed decisions and stay up to date on what's happening in the sports leagues of your interest. Download FanSports now and start your journey into the world of fantasy sports! Looking for a fun and exciting way to take part in your favorite sporting events? Then FanSports is what you are looking for! FanSports is a mobile fantasy sports app that will help you experience the world of competition and team management at the level you've always dreamed of. Our app offers you the opportunity to create your own teams, select the best players, strategize and take part in real sports competitions - all in one place! FanSports is not only fun, but also an opportunity to earn real prizes. Compete in our weekly and seasonal tournaments to win and earn points towards rewards including gift cards, match tickets and exclusive prizes. Your skill may be rewarded! pages.privacy_policy_fan_s: Privacy Policy. At FanSports, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. Home About Us How to start FAQ'S Users Say Previews DOWNLOAD APP Privacy Policy for the FanSports Platform At FanSports, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the data you provide to us when using our fantasy sports app. 1. Information We Collect: 1.1 Personal Information: When you register an account with FanSports, we may collect basic personal information such as your name, email address, and date of birth. This information is necessary for account creation and to provide you with a personalized experience on our platform. 1.2 Usage Information: We collect information about your interactions with our app, including the features you use, the leagues you participate in, and the teams you create. This information helps us improve our services and tailor them to your preferences. 1.3 Device and Log Information: To ensure the proper functioning of our app, we may collect device-specific information, such as your device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers. Additionally, we may log certain usage data, including IP addresses, browser type, and referring pages. 2. Use of Collected Information: 2.1 Providing Services: We use the information we collect to provide you with a seamless browsing experience, process payments, and enable you to participate in fantasy sports leagues. This includes team management, player selection, league updates, and news alerts related to your favorite sports. 2.2 Personalization: We strive to personalize your experience by tailoring our app's content, features, and recommendations based on your preferences and interactions. This includes suggesting relevant content, player recommendations, and targeted advertisements. 2.3 Communication: We may use your email address to send you important updates, notifications, and newsletters related to the app, as well as marketing materials if you have provided consent. You can opt out of promotional communications at any time. 2.4 Legal Compliance: FanSports may access, disclose, or preserve your information if required to do so by law or in good faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, or enforce our Terms of Service. 3. Data Security: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security, but we continually review our security practices to ensure the highest level of protection. 4. Data Retention: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you wish to delete your account or request the deletion of specific data, please contact us using the information provided in the "Contact Us" section below. 5. Children's Privacy: FanSports does not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from individuals under the age of 13. If you are under 13, please do not attempt to register an account or provide any personal information. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 13, we will take steps to promptly delete that information. 6. Changes to this Privacy Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal obligations. We encourage you to regularly review this policy to stay informed about how we protect your privacy. 7. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or the management of your personal data, please contact our Privacy Team. By using the FanSports app, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this Privacy Policy. We value your privacy and trust, and we are committed to ensuring the security and confidentiality of your personal information. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this exciting game today! pages.terms_fan_s: Terms and Conditions. By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms, including any future updates or modifications. Home About Us How to start FAQ'S Users Say Previews DOWNLOAD APP TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR FanSports These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you ("User" or "Player") and FanSports, a fantasy sports app ("App"). By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms, including any future updates or modifications. 1. Eligibility: 1.1. Users must be at least 18 years old to participate in any paid contests on the App. If you are under 18, you may only participate in free contests with appropriate parental or guardian consent. 2. Account Creation and Security: 2.1. To use the App, Users must create an account and provide accurate and complete information. Users are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account details and are liable for all activities that occur under their account. 2.2. Users are prohibited from creating multiple accounts, impersonating others, or sharing account information with third parties. 3. Contest Rules: 3.1. FanSports offers various fantasy sports contests where Users can create virtual teams, accumulate points based on real-life player performance, and compete against others. 3.2. Each contest will have specific entry fees, rules, scoring systems, and prize structures clearly outlined before entering. Users agree to adhere to these rules and acknowledge that failure to comply may result in disqualification or loss of prizes. 4. Fair Play and Prohibited Activities: 4.1. Users are expected to engage in fair and ethical play. Any form of cheating, collusion, or manipulation of contests and outcomes is strictly prohibited. 4.2. Users may not use any automated scripts, bots, or algorithms that could give them an unfair advantage in the contests or disrupt the App's functionality. 5. User Content: 5.1. Users may create and submit their own content, such as team and league names, profile pictures, and comments, within the App. By doing so, Users grant FanSports a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and distribute this content for App-related purposes. 5.2. Users are solely responsible for their content and must not submit any material that violates third-party rights, contains personal information of others, is defamatory, offensive, or illegal. 6. Intellectual Property: 6.1. The App and all its content, including but not limited to graphics, logos, text, user interfaces, and software, are protected by intellectual property rights owned by FanSports or its licensors. Users may not use, modify, reproduce, or distribute any of this content without obtaining prior written consent. 7. Limitation of Liability: 7.1. FanSports strives to provide accurate and reliable information, but Users acknowledge that the App is constantly evolving, and errors or interruptions may occur. Consequently, FanSports shall not be held liable for any loss, damage, or inconvenience caused by reliance on the App or any resulting consequences. 8. Privacy: 8.1. FanSports collects and processes personal data in accordance with applicable privacy laws and regulations. By using the App, Users consent to such collection, processing, and storage of their personal information as described in the Privacy Policy. 9. Modifications and Termination: 9.1. FanSports reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the App, including these Terms, at any time without prior notice. Users are encouraged to regularly review the Terms for updates. 10. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution: 10.1. These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms or the App shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of India. By using the FanSports App, you agree to these Terms & Conditions and enter into a legally binding agreement with FanSports. If you do not agree to any of these Terms, please refrain from using the App. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this exciting game today!
